title: Chelsea striker Michy Batshuayi destroys West Ham fan who foolishly tried to troll him - Mirror Online
text:
Sport Chelsea striker Michy Batshuayi destroys West Ham fan who foolishly tried to troll him When will the people of Twitter learn? If you try to take on Chelsea's back-up striker, you WILL end up regretting it Share Michy Batshuayi: banter boss at The Bridge (Photo: Shaun Botterill) Share Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Michy Batshuayi may not have made a big impression on the pitch at Chelsea - but he has certainly made his mark on social media. 
The Belgian striker - signed for £33.2million from Marseille in the summer - has struggled to get into Antonio Conte's side. Even when Diego Costa has been missing through suspension or injury, there have STILL been occasions when Batshuayi has been overlooked. 
However, while the 23 year-old may not quite have lived up to expectations in terms of his football, his use of Twitter has been an example to Premier League stars everywhere. Batshuayi, presumably thinking of something he's going to tweet later (Photo: Darren Walsh) 
True, Batshuayi would probably prefer to be on the field of play and scoring goals for his team. However, followers of his Twitter account can at least confirm that he is making good use of all his spare time - particularly when it comes to dealing with trolls. 
Now he's absolutely BATTERED a West Ham fan who attempted to do something similar. Batshauyi's original tweet was pretty innocent: But that didn't stop one Hammer comparing him (unfavourably) to Simone Zaza, quite possibly the worst West Ham striker in Premier League history: Suffice to say, the Chelsea man was not going to take that lying down: Let that be a lesson to you all. You mess with Batshuayi on social media, and there is every chance you will live to regret it… Like us on Facebook
